content.title: Recipient Delete Button
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand frmDetails > flexFieldsContainer.
  2. From the bottom-left of your canvas, navigate to Default Library.
  3. Next to the Default Library, you will the My Libraries tab and a search icon.
    Click the search icon.
  4. In the search bar that appears, enter RecipientButtons.
  5. From the results, under RecipientsWeb, select RecipientButtons.
  6. Drag the RecipientButtons collection onto the flexFieldsContainer on the canvas.
